info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 4:56PM CDT until May 02 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL GRADY AND SOUTHEASTERN CADDO COUNTIES... At 456 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Cyril, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Chickasha, Anadarko, Apache, Cyril, Verden, Cement, Norge, Lake Chickasha, Stecker and Laverty. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A tornado watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
